headline: Even With an Ill President, Some Scoffing at Masks
text: ANNVILLE, Pa. — Entering Ted’s Bar and Grill on Monday, Tim Girvin briefly slid on a “Trump 2020” face mask, before whisking it off to join friends at a table for lunch.
snippet: They echo misinformation that the president has spread for much of the year, as he has sought to minimize the threat of the virus.
